root.name: Track Processor Flow
root.description: display the flows generated by a set of tracks in the Track Manager plugin
root.author: fab - Fabrice de Chaumont
root.changelog:

Fix a null error
- Version 1.0.0.6 Date 2014-04-15 12:41:01

Fix: Now cleans overlay when closed.

update to fit with new detection data structure

minor fixes
